Functionality.comm: Capable of pressing garlic without the skin removed.

cont.entity_a: With a perforated piece that pops up for cleaning.
cont.entity_b: With a flip-out design. Care needed to avoid pinching fingers.
Ergonomic and lightweight. Clever hinge design.

Effort.comm: Requires minimal force to press garlic.

cont.entity_a: Double leveraging action for effortless pressing.
cont.entity_b: Less effort due to the levered design.

cont.entity_a: Built to last a lifetime with good quality control.

Operation.comm: The design makes it easy to clean and operate.

cont.entity_a: Some garlic gets stuck between the blade and the press. Crushed garlic is hard to remove from the sides of the press.
cont.entity_b: Some garlic leaks out the sides during pressing.
The chamber size is small, fitting one clove at a time.
